name: HedgeKicker! Shareware Edition
description:
The Aureate has a weed problem...

When a recipe error unleashes a seemingly endless wave of Hedge Demons into the Aureate, it's up to a sleepy (but powerful) hedge witch named Melo (and her impish ghoulfriend, Spit) to kick and blast their way to victory! Test your skill in a classic ARCADE MODE by yourself or with a friend, or take your time and challenge your wits in PUZZLE MODE--it's up to you to help Melo and Spit save the Aureate!

Special Thanks to all my QA testers:

  • ErinSnuggle
  • sprngr
  • stormpuppy
  • Zoe Simon
  • Word on the Wind
